name: Your Move
overview: Your Move is UK’s largest single estate agency with around 300 branches with the spectrum of its activities catering to buying, selling, letting, and mortgage. LSL Property Services.plc, the largest residential service provider serves to be its parent company. The Estate Agency of the year Award 2012 sponsored by the Sunday Times honored it as the Best Letting Agency Franchise ( Silver), Best Student Lettings Agency (Silver) and Best UK Large Letting Agency ( Bronze). Known for rendering the most accurate valuations, Your Move serves as an intermediary for buyers and sellers by keeping both the parties informed about the latest deals and offers. Its website yourmove.co.uk is one of the most visited estate agency website accommodating information regarding the happening and property news has over 5 million unique visitors resorting to it each year. Besides, it garners around 7, 00,000 visits on an average every month. Its bespoke letting system, Quicklet makes it the biggest letting agent in the UK. The letting system adopts a 3-step approach to letting: market, advice and protect. It also provides its consumers different type of mortgage products along with free mortgage advice to them. Under a single roof, Your Move provides a myriad of property services entailing buying, selling, letting, mortgage, and insurance, to its consumers.
